title: Auto-block after repeated denials
description: Verify that a sender is auto-blocked after 3 denied requests

steps.action: Simulate an unknown sender, primary denies (1st denial)
steps.expected: Sender added to denied list with count or timestamp

steps.action: Same sender messages again, primary denies (2nd denial)
Same sender messages again, primary denies (3rd denial)
steps.expected: Sender is auto-moved to blocked list with blocked_by: 'agent'

result: All 4 steps passed. Denial count increments, auto-block at 3 denials, blocked_by is 'agent', sender classified as blocked.
